data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that upon the request made by DCB Bank Limited (the Bank) CARE Ratings Limited
in its Rating Rationale dated December 22 2025 has assigned the ratings of the Bank as under: 
1) reaffirmed CARE AA-; Stable rating for the Basel III Complaint Tier II Bonds Programme of ?400 crore
2) reaffirmed CARE A1+ rating for ?2000 Crore (Enhanced from ?1500 Crore) Certificate of Deposit 
Programme of the Bank
3) reaffirmed CARE A1+ rating for the Short-Term Fixed Deposit Programme of the Bank
The Rating Rationale is enclosed herewith and the same is also available on website of CARE Ratings Limited.
Please take note of the above in compliance with the provision of Regulation 30 and any other applicable 
provisions of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Further to our letter Ref. No.CO:CS:RC:2025-26:125 dated July 31 2025 please note that Ms. Anuradha T.P. ceased to be the Chief Internal Auditor (CIA) and Senior Management Personnel (SMP) of the Bank with effect from close of business hours on September 16 2025. 

Mr. Krishna Ramasankaran shall take charge as the CIA of the Bank with effect from opening of the business hours on September 17 2025 for a period of three (3) years. The Bank wish him all the best for his new assignment. He shall continue to be the Senior Management Personnel (SMP) of the Bank. 

The Bank places on record its appreciation for the commitment and exemplary contribution made by 
Ms. Anuradha T.P. during her tenure and wish her very best for all her future endeavours.

Please take note of the above in compliance with Regulation 30 and other applicable regulations and circulars if any of the SEBI Listing Regulations.

data.news_body:

1) Summary of Proceeding of the AGM of the Bank as provided in Annexure - A

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the 30th Annual General Meeting (AGM) of DCB Bank Limited (the Bank) was held today i.e. Wednesday August 06 2025 at 2.30 p.m. (IST) through two-way Video Conferencing / Other Audio Visual Means to transact the business as set out in the AGM Notice dated June 16 2025 (Notice). The AGM commenced at 2:30 P.M. (IST) and concluded at 4.55 P.M. (IST).

data.caption: Intimation Of Record Date Pursuant To Regulation 42 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 For The Purpose Of Dividend For The Financial Year 2025-26
data.news_body:
This is further to our letter dated April 25 2025 wherein the Bank had informed inter alia regarding recommended a dividend of Rs.1.35 (Rupee One and Paise Thirty-Five only) per equity share of face value Rs.10/- each of the Bank for the Financial Year 2024-25 subject to approval of the Shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting (AGM) of the Bank and other requisite approvals if any.

The Board of Directors of the Bank in its meeting held on June 16 2025 has fixed Friday July 4 2025 as the Record Date for the purpose of ascertaining the entitlement of Members to the aforesaid Dividend.

The dividend subject to approval of the Shareholders and tax deduction at source (TDS) as per the provisions of Income Tax Act 1961 shall be paid within 30 days from the date of declaration as provided in the Companies Act 2013.

A brief profile of M/s. B S R & Co LLP Chartered Accountants and M/s. Varma & Varma Chartered Accountants is enclosed.
